events.e2eeIntro: Messages and documents sent in this conversation are protected with end-to-end encryption.

dialog.text: What file do you want to encrypt?

dialog.helperText: Drop the file you want to encrypt. <1>Learn more</1>

encryption.secondary: Information sent in this workspace is protected with end-to-end encryption.

close.secondary: By closing the chat, other members will not have access to its content anymore.

confirmDialog.text:
Do you really want to close the chat?
Other members will not have access to its content anymore and you won't be able to reopen it.
Being its creator, you will still have access to the content.

notOnTheList.title: Hey!
notOnTheList.subtitle: Misakey is invitation only until July 2021
notOnTheList.button: Have an invite code ? Click here
notOnTheList.getCodeDescription: We regularly send information about the next distributions of invitations by email to the members of the community. You can join the community by <1>joining this Misakey chat.</1><2/><3/>You will be able to discuss the project and try a small portion of the app to give us your early feedbacks.

dialog.content: What is the new chat about?

error.updateBackup: An error occurred while updating the vault, be sure to keep your invitation link to avoid loosing access to your chat.
